message: I'm feeling generous, Bob. Let's get this over with.
Let's be fair, 55-45 is a good deal!
I'm still feeling generous, but I need more than that. Let's find a middle ground.
Come on, Alice! You said you're feeling generous. 60-40 is a great compromise!
I'm willing to meet you halfway. Let's not let this drag on any longer.
I'm willing to take a risk. This is my best offer so far. Don't let inflation eat away at our money!
This is my final offer. We're both losing money with each round. Let's end this before it's too late.
